About me

SUMMARY

Experienced technology enthusiast. Whether its hardware or software I enjoy creating and problem solving computer technology.

SkILLS

  • In depth experience with hardware and software troubleshooting
  • Enjoys working in team or individual environments.
  • consistent and accountable
  • professional communication skills
  • Experience in programming (C#, C++, Python, Javascript, HTML, CSS)

EXPERIENCE

10/2011 to 05/2015

Electro-Optical Ordnance Repairer

United States Marine Corps － Camp Pendleton, CA

As an electronics technician I was responsible for maintaining and repairing multi-million dollar equipment. A main responsibility of mine was to troubleshoot the hardware and software of thermal binoculars and make any repairs.

01/2010 to 05/2011

Production Manager

Fusion of Ideas － Lake Forest, CA

As Production Manager It was my responsibility to receive items from shipping, install software and apply customer logo to product.

2010

El Toro High School － Lake Forest, CA, United States
